heading: Recommended Topics
sub: Don’t see a topic you’re interested in? No problem — sessions are flexible and can cover other areas too.

items.title: Business & Professional English
items.desc: Meetings, presentations, and workplace communication. Build confidence and clarity.

items.title: English for Tech & Startups
items.desc: Discuss projects, features, and teamwork. Perfect for engineers and product teams.

items.title: Travel & Everyday English
items.desc: Practical conversations for trips and daily life. Get comfortable speaking naturally.

items.title: English for Literature & Culture
items.desc: Explore books, films, and pop culture to grow vocabulary and <0>express yourself</0>.

note: All sessions are customized to your goals and interests.
